Message:
My blood boiled with
anger and remorse.

So with sword in hand,
I hacked and slashed...

refusing to stop until
I had slaughtered
every last one of them.

The last one standing
was the commander.
Before finishing off
that aristocrat,
I asked him,

He answered that everything
was for his “beloved witch,”

and that he planned to
make me disappear
along with everyone else.

That aristocrat...
was a member of
a secret society that
worships a witch.

To this day, they loathe
the ones that escaped with
their beloved witch long ago,

and have been searching
for the village of their
decendants.
